column4: evening folks, I'd like to know, and I did try google first, why ubuntu decided to bork and not read either my cd drives unless I have to restart the pc, reads a cd, when i eject and insert another one doesn't show on desktop.
or whatever the correct params for your system are
but it was doing it automagically
it would show a CD icon on the desktop
like I said it was working fine, then decided not to work.
well it loads a cd when I boot, when i insert a different cd doesnt work, and I have two drives, same thing
I did remove acetone2 and installed nautilus scripts to mount/unmount
might be something with the script then
possible.  I will try again, thanx btw.
